document.full_text: security forces have detained about 300 tibetan monks from a monastery in southwestern china for a month amid a crackdown sparked by a monk's self-immolation, two exiled tibetans and a prominent writer said, citing sources there.
document.title: chinese forces detain 300 tibetan monks for a month: sources
lines_and_colors: security forces have detained about 300 tibetan monks from a monastery in southwestern china for a month amid a crackdown sparked by a monk's self-immolation, two exiled tibetans and a prominent writer said, citing sources there.
